author: dantraMSFT
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

Build current sources and run Start-PSPester, no parameters

Expected behavior
-----------------

All Tests pass.

Actual behavior
---------------
Every test in InvokeCommandRemoteDebug.Tests.ps1 fails with the error "Cannot validate argument on parameter 'Id'. The argument is null. Provide a valid value for the argument, and then try running the command again."

The failure occurs at line 179, the AfterEach block removing the remote session:

Remove-PSSession $remoteSession -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

Environment data
----------------
Running on server datacenter 2016

$PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-128-gf587fd06d6046859ca1a9fe3470d5f9615dc5e01
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.17080
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
title: "Invoke-Command remote debugging tests" are consistently failing on server.
